extension.description: [I]A New Generation[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant Movies and TV[/B][CR][CR]This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.[CR][CR]The author does not host any of the content in this addon and takes no responsibility for content found.

[I]Nova generacija[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant Filmova i TV serija[/B][CR][CR]Ovaj dodatak ne sadrži dijelove Kodi Medijskog Centra. Ne tažite pomoć za ovaj dodatak na službenim kanalima podrške za Kodi.[CR][CR]Autor ne posjeduje bilo kakav sadržaj u ovom dodatku i ne preuzima bilo kakvu odgovornost za pronađeni sadržaj.

[I]הדור החדש[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant סרטים וסדרות[/B][CR][CR]ההרחבה הזו אינה חלק של Kodi Media Center. אנא אל תבקש עזרה עם ההרחבה זה מכל אחד מערוצי התמיכה הרשמיים של Kodi [CR][CR]. אין למחבר תוכן בהרחבה הזו והמחבר אינו אחראי לתוכן שנמצא.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!

Autor ovog dodatka ne posjeduje bilo kakav sadržaj koji je pronađen i nije povezan sa bilo kojim izvorom sadržaja. Ovaj dodatak samo pretražuje sadržaj na web stranicama. Koristite ga na vlastitu odgovornost!
מחבר ההרחבה זה אינו מארח את התוכן שיתכן ויימצא ואין לו זיקה לאף אחד מספקי התוכן. הרחבה רק מחפשת תוכן שקיים באתרי אינטרנט. השימוש בהרחבה הוא על אחריותך בלבד!

extension.description: Please visit www.tvaddons.ag for Exodus support and assistance! Kindly note that Exodus is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a third party plugin which has been added to your system.
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: tvtap app streams

extension.news: [add] Python 3 compat. [add] Settings -> Maintenance -> Delete temporary files [add] Settings -> General -> Rate video after watching [add] Settings -> API -> Enable API configuration page - when enabled, visit http://ipaddress:port/api to configure API keys from a web browser - port is configured in Settings - HTTP Server - Port [add] Storing personal api keys in api_keys.json, restore keys from json on settings loss [add] Storing login tokens in access_manager.json, restore tokens from json on settings loss [add] youtube_registration module, register developer keys and use them by appending an addon_id=:addon_id parameter to youtube add-on plugin urls [add] screensaver=true parameter to /play route - no suggested videos, no post play events, don't ask for quality [add] play route for channel live streams - plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?channel_id=UCLA_DiR1FfKNvjuUpBHmylQ&live=1 [fix] Signature deciphering [fix] context menu after playback [fix] alternative player, do not append headers [fix/upd] post play events happen post play [fix/upd] set title from metadata on play [upd] Use monitor to track api key changes [upd] Dutch strings [MB1968] [upd] French strings [bubuleur] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Spanish strings [roliverosc]
extension.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
extension.disclaimer: This plugin is not endorsed by Google
extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.
extension.disclaimer: Este add-on no esta respaldado por Google
extension.description: Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.
YouTube est l'un des plus grands sites de partage vidéos du monde.
「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.
extension.disclaimer: Η παρούσα μικροεφαρμογή δεν έχει υϊοθετηθεί από την Google
extension.description: YouTube er en av verdens største nettsider for videodeling.

extension.summary: Resolve common live video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi + find links embeded in sites.

extension.description: Python Koding AIO contains a bunch of time saving modules that allows for quick and simple development.
extension.news: Added extra art options to Custom_Dialog and new Merge_Dict function

extension.description: PyXBMCt is a mini-framework for simple XBMC addon UI buliding. It is similar to PyQt and provides parent windows, a number of UI controls (widgets) and a grid layout manager to place controls.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Resolver enlaces a videos de sitios populares para poder reproducirlos en XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
SwiftStreamz APK

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

extension.summary: This addon is almost exact copy Urlresolver from Tknorris repository https://github.com/tknorris/script.module.urlresolver. Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi. Website http://filmkodi.com . Our suport forum https://github.com/mrknow/filmkodi/issues.
extension.description: This addon is almost exact copy Urlresolver from Tknorris repository https://github.com/tknorris/script.module.urlresolver Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Use this addon to play F4m v1 and v2 streams
